cmd LC_RPATH
cmdsize 32
path @loader_path (offset 12)

      cmd LC_RPATH
  cmdsize 104
     path /Users/administrator/nightlies/2018_11_19/wheel_build_dirs/libtorch_2.7/pytorch/build/lib (offset 12)

      cmd LC_RPATH
  cmdsize 160
     path /Users/administrator/nightlies/2018_11_19/wheel_build_dirs/libtorch_2.7/pytorch/third_party/ideep/mkl-dnn/external/mklml_mac_2018.0.3.20180406/lib (offset 12)

===================
I didn't use Python, I want to use pure c++.
Why is running well in Mac OS 10.13?
